00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "strings.h"
00009 #include "files.h"
00010 
00011 MavenVariable getCompilerVariable(MavenCompiler* c, string name) {
00012         MavenVariable v;
00013         v.name = name;
00014         
00015         // for time variables
00016         time_t rawtime;
00017         struct tm* timeinfo;
00018         time(&rawtime);
00019         timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00020         
00021         if(name == "@Class") {
00022                 v.type = "maven.String";
00023                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + c->currentClass + "\")";
00024                 return v;
00025         }
00026         if(name == "@CompilerVersion") {
00027                 v.type = "int";
00028                 v.defaultValue = intToString(MAVEN_COMPILER_VERSION);
00029                 return v;
00030         }
00031         if(name == "@CompilerName") {
00032                 v.type = "maven.String";
00033                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + string(MAVEN_COMPILER_NAME) + "\")";
00034                 return v;
00035         }
00036         if(name == "@DateD") {
00037                 v.type = "maven.String";
00038                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(timeinfo->tm_mday) + "\")";
00039                 return v;
00040         }
00041         if(name == "@DateDD") {
00042                 v.type = "maven.String";
00043                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_mday, 2) + "\")";
00044                 return v;
00045         }
00046         if(name == "@DateM") {
00047                 v.type = "maven.String";
00048                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(timeinfo->tm_mon) + "\")";
00049                 return v;
00050         }
00051         if(name == "@DateMM") {
00052                 v.type = "maven.String";
00053                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_mon, 2) + "\")";
00054                 return v;
00055         }
00056         if(name == "@DateYY") {
00057                 v.type = "maven.String";
00058                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_year - 100, 2) + "\")";
00059                 return v;
00060         }
00061         if(name == "@DateYYYY") {
00062                 v.type = "maven.String";
00063                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_year + 1900, 2) + "\")";
00064                 return v;
00065         }
00066         if(name == "@File") {
00067                 v.type = "maven.String";
00068                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + basename(c->currentFile) + "\")";
00069                 return v;
00070         }
00071         if(name == "@FilePath") {
00072                 v.type = "maven.String";
00073                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + combinePaths(c->currentDirectory, c->currentFile, false) + "\")";
00074                 return v;
00075         }
00076         if(name == "@Function") {
00077                 v.type = "maven.String";
00078                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + c->currentFunction + "\")";
00079                 return v;
00080         }
00081         if(name == "@Line") {
00082                 v.type = "int";
00083                 v.defaultValue = intToString(c->lineNumber);
00084                 return v;
00085         }
00086         if(name == "@Namespace") {
00087                 v.type = "maven.String";
00088                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + c->currentNamespace + "\")";
00089                 return v;
00090         }
00091         if(name == "@Now") {
00092                 v.type = "maven.String";
00093                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(1900 + timeinfo->tm_year) + "-" +
00094                 padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_mon, 2) + "-" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_mday, 2) + " " +
00095                 padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_hour, 2) + ":" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_min, 2) + ":" +
00096                 padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_sec, 2) + "\")";
00097                 return v;
00098         }
00099         if(name == "@TimeH") {
00100                 v.type = "maven.String";
00101                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(timeinfo->tm_hour) + "\")";
00102                 return v;
00103         }
00104         if(name == "@TimeHH") {
00105                 v.type = "maven.String";
00106                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_hour, 2) + "\")";
00107                 return v;
00108         }
00109         if(name == "@TimeM") {
00110                 v.type = "maven.String";
00111                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(timeinfo->tm_min) + "\")";
00112                 return v;
00113         }
00114         if(name == "@TimeMM") {
00115                 v.type = "maven.String";
00116                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_min, 2) + "\")";
00117                 return v;
00118         }
00119         if(name == "@TimeS") {
00120                 v.type = "maven.String";
00121                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(timeinfo->tm_sec) + "\")";
00122                 return v;
00123         }
00124         if(name == "@TimeSS") {
00125                 v.type = "maven.String";
00126                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_sec, 2) + "\")";
00127                 return v;
00128         }
00129         if(name == "@Today") {
00130                 v.type = "maven.String";
00131                 v.defaultValue = "new maven::String(\"" + intToString(1900 + timeinfo->tm_year) + "-" +
00132                 padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_mon, 2) + "-" + padIntToString(timeinfo->tm_mday, 2) + "\")";
00133                 return v;
00134         }
00135         
00136         v.name = MAVEN_INVALID;
00137         return v;
00138 }
